title: League of Legends Client Repair
body:
Question. 1: I've been wondering how many minutes (on average) until the repair finishes?

Question. 2: How much megabytes does it take up to repair my files?

Thank you.

P.S: My League of Legends folder inside of Riot Games is 13.6gb

replies.body:
1. Depends on your connection. A good idea is that it'll take roughly as long as it took when you first got the game (that is, downloading the whole 3GB.)

2. We don't use megabytes. As I said, the game is around 3GB. I can't be specific because I just deleted League off my system, but that was it.

If your Riot Games folder is what-the-crapGB large, then I think that you've downloaded a copy for the game from multiple different regions. The client will not delete out-dated or different region versions of itself. Might be a good idea to just reinstall League entirely to save up some hard-drive space.
